nodes.name: verify if it has instruction messages
Sends the instructions messages to the user
set info to bag and zero counter
Ask if user want to proceed with uploading process
Verify if timeout expired for acquisition proceed
Verify if user will proceed with uploading process
Verify if there is a check url to call
Verify if a check url is provided

remaining_validators.$js: ({bag}) => { let result = bag.remaining_validators; result.shift(); return result; }

validator_error_messages.$js: ({ bag, result }) => { let errors = bag.validator_error_messages || []; if (result.data.error_list) { errors.push(...result.data.error_list.flatMap((error) => bag.current_validator.error[error] || { 'text': error })); } return errors; };

nodes.name: Notify user data received is invalid
Get user consent to verify if document is correct
Verify if a check proceed message exists
If user did not respond, check if he wants to continue
